goals.description: Create advanced networking protocols and communication framework
goals.success_criteria: HTTP/2, WebSocket, gRPC, and custom protocol support with connection pooling

goals.description: Implement real-time messaging and event streaming
goals.success_criteria: Real-time messaging with pub/sub, event streaming, and message queues

goals.description: Build network security and encryption layer
goals.success_criteria: TLS/SSL, certificate management, and secure communication protocols
